dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3229 : To protect the safety of judges by extending the authority of the Judicial Conference to redact sensitive information contained in their financial disclosure reports, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To protect the safety of judges by extending the authority of the Judicial Conference to redact sensitive information contained in their financial disclosure reports, and for other purposes.

section.header: Extension of redaction authority concerning sensitive security information
section.text: Section 105(b)(3)(E) of the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 (5 U.S.C. App.) is amended by striking 2017 both places it appears and inserting 2027.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives September 27, 2017.
